node.title: Thousands protest in Ballarat as Victoria records 980 new COVID cases and seven deaths
node.description: Dozens of businesses close as thousands of protesters descendÂ on the regional Victorian city of Ballarat in another day of demonstrations against the state's vaccine rules and pandemic legislation.
node.content:
["Dozens of businesses have closed as thousands of protesters descended on the regional Victorian city of Ballarat in another day of protests against the state's vaccine rules and pandemic legislation.", "More than 2,000 people had gathered in the Ballarat CBD by about 2pm on Sunday.", "The gold rush city was the historical home of the Eureka stockade.\u00a0The Eureka flag, a symbol of a miner's rebellion from the 1800s, has been used as a symbol of defiance by anti-lockdown protesters.", "A convoy of cars left Melbourne on Sunday morning before demonstrators met in the Ballarat CBD.", "Yesterday, an estimated 8,000 to 10,000 people gathered in Melbourne's CBD to protest the passing of the new pandemic legislation.", "The controversial law, which was passed by parliament last week,\u00a0gives\u00a0Victoria's premier and health minister the power to declare a pandemic and enforce restrictions.\u00a0", "The state opposition and some backbenchers opposed\u00a0the bill\u00a0and while many legal experts backed the safeguards introduced to the bill after negotiations, some have remained concerned about the reach of its powers.", "Ballarat Mayor Daniel Moloney said while the city was aware of its historical significance and was used to protests, \"the nature of this one has had a lot of businesses worried about whether to open or close\".", "He said about half of businesses in the CBD had closed for at least part of the day in anticipation of the demonstrations.", "Protests opposing lockdowns, vaccination and the pandemic bill have been running for months now.", "Those organised in recent weeks have been largely peaceful, and no arrests were made on Saturday, but on rare occasions, the rallies have erupted into violence.", "Cr Moloney said a frustration for businesses had been protesters not providing a route for the march, meaning it was not clear which parts of the city would be impacted.", "", "
A few hundred protesters have gathered in Ballarat in anti-government demonstrations on Sunday.(ABC News)
", "A hundreds-strong crowd first met outside the Ballarat Civic Hall. They then marched through the CBD.", "The crowd carried a large number of Eureka flags, as well as upside-down Australian flags, placards and the flags of other nations.", "The common refrain of \"sack Dan Andrews\" was chanted, along with \"Eureka, united, we'll never be defeated\".", "Josh Morelli, general manager at Aunty Jacks restaurant right across the road from the centre, said the planned protests had\u00a0been \"extremely\" disruptive to his business.", "\"We were expecting to have 60 people in for dinner this evening from the Grampians health department, they've obviously cancelled,\" he said.", "\"It's very disappointing for us.\"", "The crowd is expected to walk through the city\u00a0and leave in the early evening.", "Several hundred police are in attendance.", "United Australia Party federal\u00a0MP Craig Kelly once again addressed the crowd, describing vaccine mandates as \"unethical and un-Australian\".\u00a0", "Independent state MP Catherine Cumming led a chant of \"save the children\".", "To access most non-essential services and venues, people over the age of 12 need to show proof of vaccination or an exemption.", "More than 91.5 per cent of Victorians in that cohort have had at least two doses of a safe and effective vaccine, a number that has allowed the state to open up after lockdowns.", "The vast majority of COVID-19 cases receiving intensive care in hospitals are not fully vaccinated.", "
Victoria records 980 new COVID cases
", "Victoria has recorded 980 new local COVID-19 cases and seven deaths on Saturday.", "It is the first time in five days that the state's daily COVID-19 figures have dipped below 1,000.", "", "
Primary school children could receive their first dose of the Pfizer vaccine before the start of the new school year.(ABC News: Freya Michie)
", "The new cases were detected from 65,449\u00a0test results.", "Health authorities have linked\u00a039 infections to anti-government demonstrations in late November, a number which is unchanged since Saturday.", "Three protesters who contracted COVID-19\u00a0have been admitted to hospital, with one in intensive care.\u00a0", "There are 299\u00a0people in hospital with COVID-19 in total, of whom 40\u00a0are in intensive care and 16\u00a0are on a ventilator.", "Victoria's\u00a0Health Department said a further 43\u00a0people were in intensive care but their COVID-19 infections were no longer considered active.", "It came\u00a0as the federal government announced\u00a0it expects the first shipment of the Pfizer children's vaccine to arrive in Australia in early January, with the rollout to start from January 10.", "The TGA's provisional approval has found the vaccine is\u00a0safe and effective.\u00a0", "The national expert vaccine group, ATAGI, next needs to recommend the use of\u00a0Pfizer's child vaccine for 5-11-year-olds.", "\u00a0Premier Daniel Andrews\u00a0welcomed the news, and said his state was\u00a0standing by to help deliver the\u00a0vaccines, suggesting a schools-based program \"makes a lot of sense\".", "\"We know the TGA and then ATAGI do their work diligently, they take their time,\" Mr Andrews said.", "\"We're just now waiting for the federal government to give us a sense of what role they want us to play, what role they want, for instance, school communities to play in order to roll out that paediatric vax.\"", "", "
A number of Victorian school were temporarily closed because of COVID-19 outbreaks, such as\u00a0this primary school in\u00a0North Melbourne that shut for some time last year.(ABC News: Kyle Harley.)
", "A significant\u00a0portion of the confirmed cases\u00a0in the state's current Delta outbreak have been linked back to schools, where large groups of\u00a0\u2014 often unvaccinated \u2014 children are able to mingle.", "The vaccine rollout is officially still the domain of the federal government, but Mr Andrews suggested it was \"likely we'd get the job done faster\" if state schools became involved.", "Once approved, the vaccine will be available to approximately 2.3 million Australian\u00a0children in that\u00a0age group.\u00a0", "
New funding for school camps
", "The Victorian government has announced a multi-million-dollar\u00a0new program to get Victorian school students \"back out and about\" after the state's multiple lockdowns.", "Its $112.9 million initiative will provide more camps and outdoor activities to children during the school holidays and 2022 school term, targeting schools that have been most affected by closures because of COVID-19 outbreaks.", "\"Our kids have missed out on a lot,\" Mr Andrews said.", "\"This camps and experience package is so they can catch up on all those things they have missed: socialisation, resilience, being outdoors, having great fun with their friends.\"", "The funding will also provide more than 690,000 swimming and water safety lessons for students.", "It comes after life saving groups raised fears that the closure of swimming lessons for children during the pandemic might put young people at risk in the water over summer.", "There are now 15,433\u00a0active cases of the virus in Victoria, and 553\u00a0people have died during the state's current\u00a0outbreak, after the health department announced one death announced yesterday was a duplication.\u00a0", "", "
Why we hear about some COVID-19 variants more than others
"]
